Colossal 3–{4}{R} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with three +1/+1 counters; or pay {4}{R} as a sorcery: Put three +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
When Storm-Eye Salamander’s colossal ability puts one or more counters on it, exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards.
